response.overview: Harry Furgeson (Paul Coates) is an entrepreneur. That means he'll do almost anything that has a buck in it. Almost anything, that is, except go back into his newly acquired building that appears to be haunted. When he meets drifter Mike Broderick (Randy Daniher), Harry thinks his problems are solved, but they are just beginning.  Ellie Franklin (Jean Ann Larsen) provides the furniture for Mike's temporary stay in the vacant building, as well as the clues that help Sylvia (Lynne Sterner) contribute most dramatically to solving The Murder of Sgt. Macklin.
response.title: The Murder of Sgt. Macklin
